hero-suptitle: Come and stay in our habitats near Fethiye in Turkey

homepage_cabins_desc: Fethiye is the perfect destination for travelers looking for easy access to crystal-clear waters, combined with endless activities in a vibrant urban setting. There are many amazing things to do in Fethiye when you are ready to get out of your beach chair. Legendary tales describes it as the land of lights. This town grew fast in the 19th century because of interaction between the Turks and the Greeks. Additionally, it was named Fethiye to honor ottoman air Force pilot who died during a mission.
homepage_forest: A Little Beach Town or A Lively City
homepage_forest_desc: Fethiye is a bustling port city on Turkey’s southwest coast. I thought we would be visiting a small beach town, but in fact, Fethiye has a population of over 160,000. If you search ‘Fethiye Turkey‘ on Google Images, most of the pictures you see are of nearby Oludeniz and its beaches. So just be aware that Fethiye is not a charming little beach town, but rather a lively small city.
footer_desc: Sign up to our newsletter for special things and receive 10% off your next order.

section-desc: You will feel yourself at home in this small cozy apart hotel. Kitchen, iron, parking lot, wifi.. In short, we are ready to meet your every need. Our rooms are for 3 people and 2 of our rooms have balconies. And We have free car parking for our guests.

Our hotel is located exactly in the city center. The beaches are 10 minutes away by public transport. The coastal walking path is 3 minutes away, and you can shop on the historical Paspatur street, and you can enjoy an incredible seafood in the famous fish market.

It consists of stone architecture suitable for the texture of the region. The interior of the villa, which serves with very comfortable garden furniture, a lodge positioned by the pool and a mini playground for the use of our little guests, also has a very spacious structure. There is also a jacuzzi in one bedroom and you can enjoy the sauna and fireplace with your loved ones.

Our location is Fethiye Cenger neighborhood. You are in the right place to start the day with the sounds of birds and enjoy the sun, the nature and the pool, away from the hustle and bustle of the city.
 An important reminder: In order to have a comfortable holiday, you need to do your shopping before going to the villa, because the nearest market is 12 KM away.

Accommodating with Yoyo Tinyhouse in Fethiye is a great option for those who want to get away from ordinary holiday experiences. It is ideal for those who like to be in touch with nature, experience a minimalist lifestyle and relax in a peaceful atmosphere. 
 TinyHouse is designed as a 1+1 house and is suitable for 4 people. It offers the opportunity to dine and spend time outdoors with its large veranda.

Yoyo Tinyhouse offers a calm and peaceful rest away from the crowd and noise of the city. Our location is in Calica region close to Zincirlikavak. 
 It is 13 km from Oludeniz beach and 7.5 km from Calis beach.

area-map-desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing...

area_page.section-subtitle: Golden beaches, deep blue sea, wandering paths and special experiences....
section-desc: With its postcard-worthy backdrop of golden sands, forested mountains, and miles of azure ocean, it’s no surprise that Fethiye is among the most-visited cruise ports on Turkey’s Turquoise Coast. The town itself is equally attractive, with leafy seafront promenades, lively bazaars, and ancient ruins.

area_page.section-subtitle: Pick the place where to lay your towel...

section-desc: Thanks to its idyllic location on Turkey’s ‘sunshine coast’, Fethiye is a glorious place to enjoy the quintessential beach holiday. What makes Fethiye holidays so popular is that the beaches here really vary, from the lively and water sports-friendly to the uber quiet and off-beat hidden gems.

If you want to relax and unwind this is the best choice for you. Lay down on the deck under the Mediterranean sun, listen to the whistle of the wind and have a fresh cooked meal on the deck. And a surprise! You may see some special spots that Cleopatra had visited before you!

Turkey has a reputation for its cuisine, but nothing will prepare you for how good it actually is… Soak in the cultural sights in the heart of Fethiye old town, or enjoy a romantic sea-view as you dine on the promenade or marina area. Also The Fethiye fish market is one of the town’s most famous tourist attractions and is open all year round, staying open late in the evenings during the summer season. It’s a wonderful location and the perfect spot for a lunchtime meal (popular with locals) or a fabulous night out.

The Makri shopping center resembles a mall of sorts, but it is an affordable place. The Paspatur Bazaar is another ideal tourist option due to its balance between amazingly cheap and branded goods. You will find branded or fake designer items at an unbelievable rate if you negotiate well.

The most popular hiking trail on the Mediterranean Coast: The Lycian Way! The Lycian Way is a trekking route following the traces of the ancient trade route of the Lycians along the Turkish Mediterranean coast.

You will fall in love with the panoramic views of the surrounding. A video and many photos of your flight will be recorded and available on your request. You will take off from the top of Babadag mountain which is 1600mt (or 1900mt depends on the weather conditions) high and start a slow descent floating to the sandy beach with highly experienced pilots.

Are you ready to explore world of underwater? Don’t worry, you do not have to be professional or experienced to dive. There are professional teachers who will teach you how to and guide you all the day.
The day will start with pick up from your resort / hotel and all the Jeeps will meet at the meeting point to start the journey all together as a convoy. Tlos - Saklikent Gorge -

If you are looking for excitement and adventure, this activity is for you. Riding over bumpy terrain and through muddy puddles creates a sense of excitement that they can't get from everyday activities.
Travel on the forest paths and enjoy the scenery of the area offers you an joyful experience for all your family. Don’t forget to wear trousers and shoes and a hat might be useful under sunshine.

about_us_section_title: “You are not a client for us, you are our precious guests that we host in our home.”
about_us_section_desc: It is our first priority to make you feel at home in our distinguished Fethiye, which is one of the most beautiful coastal cities in Turkey. We have thought everything to afford all your needs. Apart otel - Monihomes and our villas are at the top of their own concepts. We have created different concepts for you. From those who want to relax with the melody of bird sounds in nature to those who want to feel the energy of the city..
